section.p:
After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback. The Token expires after a period of time, at which point the SDK cannot connect to the server. Agora recommends that you generate a new Token on your server and call this method to update it in any of the following situations:
Receive the callback indicating the Token is about to expire.
Receive the callback indicating the Token has expired.
Receive the callback reporting CONNECTION_CHANGED_TOKEN_EXPIRED (9).

Call this method to update the Token. After a successful call, the SDK triggers the callback. The Token expires after a certain period, after which the SDK cannot connect to the server. Agora recommends generating a new Token on your server and calling this method to update it in any of the following situations:
You receive the callback indicating the Token is about to expire.
You receive the callback indicating the Token has expired.
You receive the callback with the state CONNECTION_CHANGED_TOKEN_EXPIRED (9).

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter, such as an empty Token.
-7: The object is not initialized. Please initialize the object before calling this method.
110: The Token is invalid. Please ensure the following:
The user ID specified when generating the Token is the same as the one used to join the channel.
The generated Token is the same as the one passed in when joining the channel.

< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter, e.g., the passed Token is empty.
-7: The object is not initialized. Please initialize the object before calling this method.
110: Invalid Token. Please ensure the following:
The user ID specified when generating the Token matches the one used when joining the channel.
The generated Token is the same as the one passed when joining the channel.
